amendment.description: To strike a reduction in the supplemental nutrition assistance program, with an offset that limits crop insurance reimbursements to providers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 931 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 26 - 70. Record Vote Number: 131.

action.text: Amendment SA 931 proposed by Senator Gillibrand.
